def clean(doc):
    stop_free = " ".join([i for i in doc.lower().split() if i not in stop])
    punc_free = " ".join([ch for ch in stop_free if ch not in exclude])
    num_free = " ".join(i for i in punc_free if not i.isdigit())
    return num_free
